html: 7.18.20  1:58 am   What is it about tuesday that makes it sound like a good day of the week to post new content?
7.18.20  1:10 am   what are your thoughts on ducks?
7.18.20  12:44 am   How can I become better at piano?
7.17.20  11:11 pm   how old was the old-fashioned train in 'new canaan'?
7.17.20  10:16 pm   How to teach yourself something?
7.17.20  9:26 pm   how do I figure out how to describe a feeling when I don't have the words?
7.17.20  8:53 pm   Why is your latest song called "Might Quit" ?

7.17.20  8:45 pm   what do you think of w and u

do w and u have relations or are they in different universes
7.17.20  8:26 pm   Has there ever been a situation where you were going to disagree with something, but further thought provoked you to agree instead?
7.17.20  7:43 pm   of the top of your head is there anything you think is important to remember when trying to mix instruments so that they are all able to be heard. thanks bill
7.17.20  6:46 pm   can you please give us a hint on a video you're working on?
7.17.20  5:56 pm   what in your day to day life gives you purpose?
7.17.20  5:14 pm   are u a professional artist?
7.17.20  4:25 pm   Did you wake up in the morning and travel straight into the Sun?

7.17.20  3:16 pm   your dedication to getting things done honestly amazes me. martin molin often talks about delayed gratification; he's been working on an extremely complex marble machine for the past 3 and a half years and he's been talking about how it's hard to stay motivated when you're working on something for so long and you don't get to see the finished product until the end. but even he does weekly build logs, which is a regular form of creative output. You, on the other hand, spent almost a year working exclusively on HotEWIG with no output whatsoever. and you're doing something similar right now, except you don't even really seem to have a solid, set end goal this time.

      there's no one big project you'll get to release at the end of this that will make you feel satisfied like all of that hard work culminated into this one big thing.

      how do you do it?

      I can't possibly imagine sitting down and spending over a year teaching myself a skill without even a pro ject in mind.

      basically you are incredible and i would like to know your secrets
7.17.20  2:52 pm   How do you conceptualize difficult topics concisely in your head?
7.17.20  2:37 pm   what is the solution to the coastline paradox?
7.17.20  2:35 pm   what do feel is the most funniest thing?
7.17.20  2:08 pm   how are you dealing with the pandemic, lockdown, general increasing chaos  in the world?
7.17.20  1:37 pm   why do things happen?
7.17.20  12:51 pm   What is your favourite physics problem?
7.17.20  12:49 pm   what's the difference between the five chord and the five seven chord
7.17.20  12:32 pm   What's the funniest question you've been asked on this website?

7.17.20  11:44 am   bill, are you a time traveler?

     or do your lyrics just coincedentaly link up with whats happening in 2020?

7.17.20  11:40 am   you say you're gonna make multiple new videos, but do you not think that the same thing is just going to happen again and your new process won't be enough and you'll want more and more?

     or are you not concerned about the next step after this step?

7.17.20  11:13 am   based on all the answers you had post this year, i think you are working on a new method to create videos through a program called Blender, since the old method you used was not convenient or efficient because you need to use up to 4 programs to create and they are pretty slow,

      and you have written Blender scripts to control the program as the way you prefer it to.

      so, the question is, based on estimation and trial-and-error, how far you have done during the way and what month (or what year) will be the so-called the return of bill wurtz?
7.17.20  10:18 am   Do you make your music or does your music make you?
7.17.20  10:16 am   Why do you claim normalcy despite having such a unique style?
7.17.20  10:07 am   Are you working on 1 massive video like when you didn't upload for ages when making history of the entire world?
